title: After waited the whole morning to play lol, now the game just keeps crashing, WTF
body: Anyone else have the same issue???

replies.body:
Hey Herumesu,

At what point is it crashing, and are you receiving a crash error? If you happen to be running Lolreplays, please uninstall it for the time being, as there's an issue with it causing crashes right now. Let me know.

-DTN
Thank you, it works fine after i uninstalled lolreplay, should i wait for the new version of lolreplay and install it or is lolreplay going to continue to impact with lol itself?
I don't know when or if it will be fixed. I recommend using [BaronReplays](https://ahri.tw/en/FAQ/), for at least the time being until then. I can vouch for it working because I'm using it right now.
